buffs.name: Double Points
buffs.description: This tile awards 2x points when completed

buffs.name: Bonus Tile Attempt
buffs.description: If this tile fails verification, you get one retry

buffs.name: Quick Complete
buffs.description: This tile counts as completed 24 hours earlier than actual time

buffs.name: Chain Reaction
buffs.description: Completing this tile unlocks all adjacent tiles immediately

buffs.name: Steal Shield
buffs.description: This tile cannot be stolen by the enemy team

buffs.name: Enemy Radar
buffs.description: Completing this reveals 3 random enemy ship locations

buffs.name: Triple Points
buffs.description: This tile awards 3x points when completed

buffs.name: Area Bomb
buffs.description: Completing this also damages all adjacent enemy tiles

buffs.name: Team Rally
buffs.description: Next 3 tiles completed by ANY team member give +50% points

buffs.name: Reinforced Ship
buffs.description: This ship segment takes 2 hits to destroy instead of 1

buffs.name: Wild Card
buffs.description: Can be substituted for any other tile on the board

buffs.name: Progress Accelerator
buffs.description: All team tile progress counts as 1.5x for the next 6 hours

buffs.name: Extended Vision
buffs.description: Can see 2-tile radius around your completed tiles

buffs.name: Bomb Shield
buffs.description: Next 2 enemy bombs miss your ships

buffs.name: Point Storage
buffs.description: Store up to 500 bonus points that can't be stolen

buffs.name: Rapid Fire
buffs.description: Team can attempt 2 tiles simultaneously for 12 hours

buffs.name: Critical Strike
buffs.description: Next bomb destroys the entire enemy ship (all segments)

buffs.name: Time Freeze
buffs.description: Enemy team's progress frozen for 2 hours after you complete this

buffs.name: Perfect Accuracy
buffs.description: Next 5 bombs automatically hit enemy ships

buffs.name: Ship Repair
buffs.description: Restore one destroyed ship segment

buffs.name: Spy Network
buffs.description: See enemy team's next 3 tile targets

buffs.name: Combo Chain
buffs.description: Each consecutive tile increases points by +25% (max 200%)

buffs.name: Hidden Treasure
buffs.description: Random chance to find bonus 100-500 points on any tile

buffs.name: Defensive Barrier
buffs.description: Create a 3-tile shield around your ships

buffs.name: Pirate's Fortune
buffs.description: Steal 10% of enemy team's points when completing this tile

buffs.name: Tactical Strike
buffs.description: Destroy a 3x3 grid area on enemy board

buffs.name: Lucky Streak
buffs.description: 25% chance each tile gives double rewards

buffs.name: Auto-Complete
buffs.description: This tile is instantly completed (still needs verification)

buffs.name: Ship Relocation
buffs.description: Move one of your ships to a new location

buffs.name: Team Synergy
buffs.description: All teammates' progress on any tile counts toward each other

debuffs.name: Point Penalty
debuffs.description: This tile only awards 50% points

debuffs.name: Time Lock
debuffs.description: Must wait 48 hours after claiming before completion counts

debuffs.name: Extra Verification
debuffs.description: This tile requires 2 screenshots for proof instead of 1

debuffs.name: Mystery Task
debuffs.description: Tile task is hidden until claimed by team

debuffs.name: Point Leak
debuffs.description: Lose 10 points per hour until this tile is completed

debuffs.name: Exposed Position
debuffs.description: Enemy team can steal this tile even after completion

debuffs.name: Explosive Tile
debuffs.description: If enemy bombs this, 2 adjacent friendly tiles also take damage

debuffs.name: Signal Flare
debuffs.description: Completing this reveals 2 of your ship locations to enemy

debuffs.name: Worthless Tile
debuffs.description: This tile awards 0 points but must be completed for ship safety

debuffs.name: Enhanced Difficulty
debuffs.description: Must complete the task twice to count

debuffs.name: Solo Mission
debuffs.description: Only ONE team member can work on this tile

debuffs.name: Time Bomb
debuffs.description: Must complete within 24 hours or lose 200 points

debuffs.name: Locked Chain
debuffs.description: Must complete 3 other tiles before this unlocks

debuffs.name: Cursed Ground
debuffs.description: Completing this gives enemy team +100 points

debuffs.name: Tracking Beacon
debuffs.description: Enemy can see this ship segment's location permanently

debuffs.name: Shared Penalty
debuffs.description: Lose points equal to what you gain (net zero)

debuffs.name: Sabotaged Task
debuffs.description: First completion attempt automatically fails

debuffs.name: High Value Target
debuffs.description: Enemy team can see this tile's location

debuffs.name: Exhaustion
debuffs.description: Team cannot claim another tile for 3 hours after this one

debuffs.name: Backfire
debuffs.description: If abandoned, lose points equal to time spent on it

debuffs.name: Dense Fog
debuffs.description: Cannot see adjacent tiles until this is completed

debuffs.name: High Risk
debuffs.description: 50% chance to gain 300 points, 50% chance to lose 150 points

debuffs.name: All Hands Required
debuffs.description: ALL team members must contribute to complete this tile

debuffs.name: Public Announcement
debuffs.description: Enemy team is notified when you start working on this tile

debuffs.name: Mirage
debuffs.description: Appears complete to you but enemy can still bomb it

debuffs.name: Nightmare Mode
debuffs.description: Task requirement increased by 50%

debuffs.name: Weak Point
debuffs.description: If bombed, entire ship takes critical damage

debuffs.name: Delayed Reward
debuffs.description: Points awarded 48 hours after completion

debuffs.name: Supply Shortage
debuffs.description: Each hour active, random team member loses 50 points

debuffs.name: Communications Jammed
debuffs.description: Team chat disabled for 2 hours after claiming this tile
